title: Easy broccoli quiche
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 onion, minced', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '175g fresh broccoli, chopped', '1 (23cm) prepared pastry case', '175g grated mozzarella cheese', '4 eggs, well beaten', '350ml milk', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '1 tablespoon butter, melted']
